title: Great Teammate ribbon

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I have been Great Teamate ribbon for over 3 years but i didn't get my icon of Great Teammate i only have this one see the link.

replies.body: It could be because that specific icon just hasn't made it's way onto your account yet. Wait a day or so, and let me know if you still don't see it!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xWrLEBLQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-29T22:04:18.692+0000)
>
> It could be because that specific icon just hasn't made it's way onto your account yet. Wait a day or so, and let me know if you still don't see it!

I had the yellow and red ribbon way back many years ago when the honor system rolled out. Is it possible we will get the icon even if we didn't end with the ribbon when old honor was removed?

Does region changes have any impact on this, I have friends who swapped from other regions and lost their honors because of it. I had the great mentor banner a few seasons ago but I've swapped regions once or twice since then. I got the banner on NA but I'm worried the region swaps might effect that?
There's a pretty good chance those honors could have been wiped on the transfer. Since these icons are based off being in the top 10% *of your region* this account might not be getting them.

It says that if you had the banner at any time you'll get the icon. I got the banner on NA, but then server transferred to OCE to get one of the exclusive icons then immediately transferred back to NA after getting the Icon, so im still on the region I originally got the banner on,

Decent point, and tbh I'm not actually 100% sure that would end up working in the long run. Those icons are still going to be going out until 9/30, so let's wait until they've all been given out and then we can take a look at your account to see what's up.

Got it i guess i didn't be patient enough.

https://gyazo.com/59fdaf991e36f461f270578360f659df

Little patience goes a long way sometimes xD!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Received a Great Teammate ribbon (i had it)
or
Were in the top 10% of Teamwork honors in your region
